entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
